methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize the image acquisition system.
:param source_type: Type of image source ('camera', 'file', 'stream').
:param source_path: Path to the image source (optional for 'camera').

methods.name: get_frame
methods.docstring:
Capture a frame from the source.
:return: Image frame as a numpy array.

methods.name: preprocess_frame
methods.docstring:
Preprocess the image frame.
:param frame: Raw image frame.
:return: Preprocessed image frame.

methods.name: extract_metadata
methods.docstring:
Extract metadata from an image file.
:param file_path: Path to the image file.
:return: Metadata dictionary.

functions.name: get_frame
functions.docstring:
Capture a frame from the source.
:return: Image frame as a numpy array.

functions.name: preprocess_frame
functions.docstring:
Preprocess the image frame.
:param frame: Raw image frame.
:return: Preprocessed image frame.

functions.name: extract_metadata
functions.docstring:
Extract metadata from an image file.
:param file_path: Path to the image file.
:return: Metadata dictionary.
